reviewText: What I think is great about this box set is that it is older episodes that my boys have never seen.  The DVDs are full of episodes from 1999-2006 and each is 35-57 minutes long.  I actually have a five-disc DVD player in our basement and filled it with this box set so when one DVD ends it automatically goes to the next one - yes it's a lot of Barney for me to watch but my boys do love the singing and dancing and what is not to love about a giant purple dinosaur!  Each DVD also focuses on a certain topic like ABCs, numbers, rhyming, schooltime, colors, and counting, so it is great too if your preschooler is learning something specific then you can coordinate with a Barney DVD.  My sons favorite DVD though is the "Rhyme Time Rhythm" from this set and it features all the popular Mother Goose rhymes come to life!  All the DVDs really though are great and for the price of this set ($23.99 on Amazon) you can't go wrong for getting six whole DVDs!  This set would be perfect for old or new Barney fans as the episodes are some of the great ones!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I purchased these DVDs for my 5 month old daughter and she LOVES them. She watches them over and over. I have seen many many episodes of Barney as it is my daughter's favorite show so far and I think these are some of the best episodes that I have seen. The only thing that I noticed is that the episodes chosen for this pack use the same songs over and over again but baby doesn't seem to mind. Also a little annoying is that there is only one episode per disc which is somewhat mitigated by the fact that the DVD has a "play continuously" option. Would have been even more annoying if I had to replay manually each time the episode ends. Overall, very cute DVDs for a decent price.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My one and half loves this so much! The hardest part is to choice just one for him to watch at a time, because they are all so great!

reviewText: I have it on good authority that my grandson absolutely loves his Barney DVDs.  He is only 2 and has taught himself to insert, play, stop, and remove DVDs.  He cannot get enough of Barney.  Another plus is actually learning from these.  He's happy--I'm happy.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Part of the wildly popular television series starring Barney the purple dinosaur, Barney: Furry Friends is a wonderful children's DVD featuring Barney, his colorful dino friends, and their encounters meeting a wide variety of different show trainers and their animals. From how to take care of one's own furry canine or feline friends, to a user-friendly guide that should help one train one's pet, to a captivating visual guide of the different types of animal breeds, Barney: Furry Friends lives up to its title and is sure to be a hit even with any young person who normally avoids animals. 62 minutes.
summary: Sure to be a hit even with any young person who normally avoids animals

reviewText: Has a lot of great episodes, plus a couple of bonus ones. For the price, I think they could have included a bonus episode on each disk. Otherwise, it's a great collection.

reviewText: I let my 15 month old watch these while in the car. She may be too young to understand it all, but it certainly keeps her entertained back there and makes for a peaceful drive.

reviewText: I love the messages in this Barney - being kind to animals but also taking care of them, volunteering at a shelter, etc.  The songs are catchy and the messages are good.  The only downside is when your child wants to watch it ten billion times in a row.

reviewText: I was trying Barney out on my son just trying to find out what he would like since he was so young we weren't sure. Barney is a good teacher in these DVD's but they aren't his favorite!! My 7 year old daughter likes them pretty well and my son doesn't hate them but like I said they aren't his first pick. He is only just 2 now so he may start to enjoy them more as he gets older we'll see.
